### Pre-Release Checklist

- [ ] All tests passing on main branch
- [ ] Version files are consistent (VERSION, package.json)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md is up to date with all changes
- [ ] README.md version badge is updated
- [ ] RELEASE_NOTES.md is updated with this version's highlights
- [ ] Documentation is complete and accurate

### Post-Merge Actions

After this PR is merged:
1. ✅ GitHub Release will be automatically created
2. ✅ Docker image will be pushed to Docker Hub with tags:
   - `latest`
   - `<version>` (e.g., `4.5.0`)
   - `<major.minor>` (e.g., `4.5`)
   - `<major>` (e.g., `4`)
